translation.en: [narrator] Jason Bateman and Maya Rudolph are about to guest star
translation.zh:
‎杰森·贝特曼和玛雅·鲁道夫
‎即将客串

translation.en: on the Murderville Christmas Special.
translation.zh: ‎《谋杀小镇》圣诞特别节目

translation.en: But here's the catch, everyone has been given a script... except them.
translation.zh:
‎但有个问题 别人都有剧本...
‎除了他俩

translation.en: Hi, my name's Jason Bateman. I am here doing Murderville.
translation.zh:
‎嗨 我叫杰森·贝特曼
‎我在《谋杀小镇》做演出

translation.en: I'm Maya Rudolph.
translation.zh: ‎我叫玛雅·鲁道夫

translation.en: I'm about to do Murderville.
translation.zh: ‎我即将参加《谋杀小镇》演出

translation.en: I have been given no script.
translation.zh: ‎我没有收到任何剧本

translation.en: -I have not been given a script. -What I know is next to nothing.
translation.zh:
‎-我没有收到任何剧本
‎-我对要发生的事一无所知

translation.en: I love that I didn't have to learn any lines.
translation.zh:
‎我喜欢这样
‎我不需要熟悉任何台词

translation.en: [Jason] I've seen no actors. I've seen no sets.
translation.zh:
‎我没见过演员
‎我没看过布景

translation.en: I'm going to have to figure out who the murderer is.
translation.zh: ‎我得弄清楚谁是凶手

translation.en: And that makes me nervous. So, I don't know who's here,
translation.zh:
‎这让我很紧张
‎我不知道谁在这... ‎（侦探在训练中）

translation.en: what's happening... [chuckles] ...and what I'm going to do, which I'm delighted by.
translation.zh:
‎...我对正在发生的
‎以及我将要做的事情非常兴奋

translation.en: [Terry] The holidays,
translation.zh: ‎假期

translation.en: a magical time each year when we set aside our differences
translation.zh:
‎每年的神奇时刻
‎我们抛开分歧

translation.en: and unite around one common belief, that Christmas sucks ass.
translation.zh:
‎围绕一个共同的信念团结在一起
‎那个圣诞节糟透了

translation.en: At least that's what I used to think. My name is Terry Seattle.
translation.zh:
‎至少那是我过去的想法
‎我叫特里·西雅图

translation.en: I'm a senior homicide detective with a failed marriage
translation.zh: ‎高级刑事案侦探 有桩失败的婚姻

translation.en: and moderate to severe plaque psoriasis.
translation.zh: ‎并患有中高度斑块状银屑病

translation.en: And this is a story of one magical night, when my whole world changed.
translation.zh:
‎这个故事发生在一个神奇的夜晚
‎它改变了我的整个世界

translation.en: Bingo.
translation.zh: ‎答对了

translation.en: -[phone rings] -[grunts]
translation.zh: ‎（《虎胆龙威》（仅酷炫部分））

translation.en: -What is it Rhonda-slash-Chief? -Merry Christmas, Terry.
translation.zh: ‎有什么事，朗达/局长？ ‎圣诞快乐！

translation.en: Is it? Is it a merry Christmas?
translation.zh:
‎是么？
‎就为了祝我圣诞快乐？

translation.en: I'll be quick, 'cause I'm in Hawaii with Daz,
translation.zh: ‎我尽量长话短说 我在夏威夷

translation.en: we booked paddle boarding lessons.
translation.zh: ‎我们预约了桨板冲浪课程

translation.en: Did I forget to cash an alimony check again?
translation.zh: ‎我又忘记兑现赡养费支票了？

translation.en: Yes, but that's not why I'm calling.
translation.zh: ‎这不是我打电话的原因

translation.en: Mayor Palmer's hosting City Hall's annual holiday party,
translation.zh: ‎市长正举办着市政厅的年度假日派对

translation.en: and there's been a mix up.
translation.zh: ‎安排有点错乱

translation.en: She needs someone to run security details, so get down there ASAP.
translation.zh:
‎她需要有人来管理安全细节
‎所以尽快到那里去

translation.en: Just 'cause I hate Christmas, doesn't mean I want to work.
translation.zh: ‎我讨厌圣诞节并不是说我想工作

translation.en: Besides, one person can't handle that event.
translation.zh: ‎另外 一个人无法处理那种活动

translation.en: -Which is why I got you a new partner. -What?
translation.zh:
‎-这就是我会给你找个新搭档的原因
‎-什么？

translation.en: No. Chief, come on!
translation.zh: ‎不行 局长 得了吧！

translation.en: I'll text you the details. Have fun!
translation.zh: ‎我会把详情发短信给你 祝你开心！

translation.en: I hope you fall off the paddle board, then sharks circle you.
translation.zh:
‎希望你从桨板上掉下来
‎然后鲨鱼把你包围

translation.en: -But don't eat... Ah, she hung up. -[doorbell rings]
translation.zh:
‎但是别吃...
‎她挂了电话

translation.en: I heard you the first time.
translation.zh: ‎别按了 我听见了

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: ‎嘿

translation.en: Well, if it isn't the Ghost of Christmas ass.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 但愿这不是圣诞幽灵 ‎（请勿颂歌）

translation.en: That's not complimentary.
translation.zh: ‎这可不是恭维

translation.en: -Good to see you. -Come on in.
translation.zh:
‎-很高兴见到你
‎-快进来

translation.en: You are Detective Seattle perhaps, I hope.
translation.zh:
‎你应该是西雅图侦探吧
‎但愿没错

translation.en: Look at this guy, he's already got questions.
translation.zh: ‎看看这人 他已经有问题了

translation.en: -Pop a seat right here. -Yep.
translation.zh:
‎-在这里找个座位
‎-是的

translation.en: -Can I come around? -I wish you would.
translation.zh:
‎-我可以过来吗？
‎-我希望你能

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: ‎嗨

translation.en: -[sighs] -Is this breakfast?
translation.zh: ‎这是早餐吗？

translation.en: -You always talk when you're nervous? -[laughs]
translation.zh: ‎你紧张时总爱说话吗？ ‎（实习生）

translation.en: -Let's start with the basics. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-让我们从最基本的开始
‎-好的

translation.en: -What's your name? -Jason.
translation.zh:
‎-你叫什么名字？
‎-杰森

translation.en: -Bateman. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-贝特曼
‎-好的

translation.en: What's your profession before you became a homicide trainee?
translation.zh:
‎在做刑事案实习生前
‎你是什么职业？

translation.en: I used to be an actor. I'm looking for
translation.zh: ‎我曾是名演员 我在寻求

translation.en: -a career change. -Kicked out?
translation.zh:
‎-职业转变
‎-被踢出局了？

translation.en: -No, not kicked out. -Close?
translation.zh:
‎-不 根本就不是被踢出局了
‎-差不多的原因？

translation.en: -No, it was totally voluntary. -What kind of roles would you play?
translation.zh:
‎-不 根本就不是被踢出局了
‎-差不多的原因？ ‎-不 这完全是自愿的
‎-你会扮演什么样的角色？

translation.en: Just a normal, average, dumb white guy.
translation.zh: ‎就一个普通的 平常的 愚蠢的白人

translation.en: -That makes sense. -Sorry?
translation.zh:
‎-这对我来说合情合理
‎-什么？

translation.en: You come waltzing in here, thinking you can do my job.
translation.zh:
‎你漫不经心地走来
‎以为你能胜任我的工作

translation.en: -No. -I don't...
translation.zh:
‎-不是
‎-我没有...

translation.en: -You ever worked security before? -No, I have not.
translation.zh:
‎-你以前做过安保工作吗？
‎-我没有

translation.en: I got three callbacks for one security part, but didn't get that one.
translation.zh:
‎我收到三个第二次面试安保的邀请
‎但是没有得到安保的工作

translation.en: -Like a commercial? -Huh?
translation.zh:
‎像广告？ ‎不 不是
‎你怎么敢这样说

translation.en: No, no. How dare you.
translation.zh:
‎不 不是
‎你怎么敢这样说

translation.en: We're gonna be working a security detail down at City Hall.
translation.zh: ‎我们将在市政厅做安保工作

translation.en: Number one thing is threat assessment.
translation.zh: ‎第一件事是威胁评估

translation.en: Think you'd be good at that?
translation.zh: ‎你擅长威胁评估吗？

translation.en: -Well, I-- -See any threat around you right now?
translation.zh: ‎你擅长威胁评估吗？ ‎现在你注意到周围有任何威胁吗？

translation.en: -I see a lot of VHS tapes. -Jason Bateman,
translation.zh:
‎-我看到很多家庭影院磁带
‎-杰森·贝特曼

translation.en: do you see any other kind of threat other than these items?
translation.zh: ‎除此之外 你还注意到其他威胁吗？

translation.en: Is there anything threatening to you?
translation.zh: ‎有什么威胁到你的东西吗？

translation.en: -Nothing at all in front of me. -Huh.
translation.zh: ‎我面前什么都没有

translation.en: Sit down! Sit down!
translation.zh: ‎坐下！坐下来！

translation.en: You see that?
translation.zh: ‎你看见那个人了吗？

translation.en: You did not assess the threat! Sit down!
translation.zh: ‎你没有评估威胁！坐下！

translation.en: You let a raving lunatic into my home!
translation.zh: ‎你让一个极端疯子进入我家

translation.en: Lucky for you, it was my former trainee, Marshawn Lynch.
translation.zh:
‎算你幸运 那人是我以前的实习生
‎马肖恩·林奇

translation.en: -Holy. Good Lord. -Shit!
translation.zh:
‎-天啊 上帝啊
‎-该死！

translation.en: -Big fan. -The best damn
translation.zh:
‎-天啊 上帝啊
‎-该死！ ‎-忠实粉丝
‎-我遇到过的

translation.en: homicide trainee I ever had.
translation.zh:
‎最棒的刑事案实习生 ‎-你并没有评估威胁
‎-他还没进入室内

translation.en: -You did not assess the threat. -He wasn't in the room yet.
translation.zh:
‎-你并没有评估威胁
‎-他还没进入室内

translation.en: Exactly. You should be thinking about outside of the room.
translation.zh:
‎正是如此
‎你应该思考房间外面的情况

translation.en: -Is there more trouble outside? -You tell us.
translation.zh: ‎外面有更多麻烦吗？ ‎你告诉我们

translation.en: Is everybody going to die? Are we going to die
translation.zh: ‎有人会死吗？我们会死吗？

translation.en: -in your hands, Jason Bateman? -I don't want that to happen.
translation.zh:
‎-死于你手？
‎-我不想发生这样的事情

translation.en: -How can I help? -You gotta stay alive.
translation.zh:
‎-我能做什么？
‎-你得活着

translation.en: -Okay. -Put your face in here.
translation.zh:
‎-好的
‎-把你的脸放在这里

translation.en: Look at this guy. Listen to him.
translation.zh: ‎看着这个人 听他说

translation.en: -Shit, that is the fucking Ozark dude. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-该死 那是他妈的欧扎克 老兄
‎-谢谢

translation.en: -You're the best. -No problem, Chief.
translation.zh:
‎-你是最棒的
‎-没问题 局长

translation.en: Make yourself at home, whatever you want.
translation.zh: ‎像在自己家里一样 别拘谨

translation.en: -That's it for him? -He's going to chill out.
translation.zh:
‎-对他来说就是这样
‎-他去放松一下

translation.en: It's Christmas. Let's get out of here.
translation.zh: ‎这是圣诞节 我们出去吧

translation.en: -Let's do it. -[phone chimes]
translation.zh:
‎-我们开始吧
‎-好吧 等一下

translation.en: -All right, hang on a second. Uh-oh. -[Jason chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎-我们开始吧
‎-好吧 等一下 ‎这是这里的局长刚发来的

translation.en: This is just something from the chief here.
translation.zh: ‎这是这里的局长刚发来的

translation.en: What size booties do you wear?
translation.zh: ‎你穿的靴子是多大号的？

translation.en: [Terry] Turns out the holiday party was short an elf,
translation.zh: ‎原来节日派对少了一个精灵

translation.en: so Jason was pressed into emergency service.
translation.zh: ‎所以临时征用杰森提供应急服务

translation.en: Little did we know his job would soon go from spreading cheer,
translation.zh:
‎我们几乎不知道他的工作很快就会
‎从传播欢乐

translation.en: to solving murder.
translation.zh: ‎到破解谋杀案

translation.en: Look at this.
translation.zh: ‎看看这个

translation.en: -They smudged their names. -Pretty smeary.
translation.zh:
‎-他们玷污了他们自己的名字
‎-很油腻

translation.en: [Terry] Amateur hour. You guys never heard of a Sharpie?
translation.zh:
‎弄得太业余了
‎你们从来没有听说过记号笔？

translation.en: You ready? How you feeling? Feeling good?
translation.zh:
‎你准备好了吗？
‎你感觉怎么样？感觉好吗？

translation.en: I'm happy now. We're at a party.
translation.zh: ‎我现在很开心 我们在聚会

translation.en: Good. The Mayor said that she needed Santa's elf
translation.zh: ‎市长说她需要圣诞老人的小精灵帮忙

translation.en: as a helper, I wanna know you're here to help.
translation.zh:
‎作为帮手
‎我想确认你是来帮忙的

translation.en: -Are you here to help? -I'm here to help.
translation.zh: ‎我是来帮忙的

translation.en: Are you getting into a holiday outfit?
translation.zh: ‎你穿上节庆服装了吗？

translation.en: I need you looking alive, looking for threats.
translation.zh:
‎我需要你看起来活跃的
‎寻找威胁

translation.en: Look at all these presents. Wow!
translation.zh: ‎看看所有这些礼物 哇喔

translation.en: These are incredible.
translation.zh: ‎简直难以置信

translation.en: What, do we just grab one of these... Angus?
translation.zh:
‎我们可以直接拿一个做礼物
‎对吗 安格斯？

translation.en: Angie, and no. This toy drive is for the local orphanage.
translation.zh:
‎我叫安吉 答案是不行
‎赠送玩具的活动是面向当地的孤儿

translation.en: Later, Santa will deliver the gifts to the kids.
translation.zh:
‎过一会儿 圣诞老人
‎会把礼物送给孩子们

translation.en: Oh my gosh! Noise canceling headphones! These are the best.
translation.zh: ‎降噪耳机 这些是最好的

translation.en: -You ever used these before? -I'd love some right now.
translation.zh:
‎-你用过这些吗？
‎-我现在就想要一些

translation.en: -They cancel out the noise. -Yep.
translation.zh:
‎-它们能消除噪声
‎-是的

translation.en: -Can I have these? -[Angie] Absolutely not.
translation.zh:
‎-我能拥有那些吗？
‎-当然不行

translation.en: -Each present is for a specific orphan. -Wow.
translation.zh:
‎-每个礼物都是送给特定孤儿的
‎-哇喔

translation.en: These orphans, parents die and people just give you presents?
translation.zh:
‎这些孤儿 父母去世了
‎然后人们就送你礼物了？

translation.en: Wish my parents had just died like that. [quietly] Grab those.
translation.zh:
‎真希望我父母就那么去世了
‎然后拿这些礼物

translation.en: -Three presents? -No, these.
translation.zh:
‎-三个礼物？
‎-不是 是这些

translation.en: Stuff 'em in. In your vest.
translation.zh:
‎把它们塞进去
‎塞进你的背心里

translation.en: I've always wanted a pair of these.
translation.zh: ‎我一直想要一对这些东西

translation.en: You got it? Zip 'em right in there. That looks good.
translation.zh:
‎弄好了吗？好好拉上拉链
‎看起来没问题

translation.en: -Detective. -Mayor Palmer, how are you?
translation.zh:
‎-侦探
‎-嘿 你好吗？

translation.en: Detective Seattle, thank you for coming on short notice.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你在短时间内就到来

translation.en: And you must be?
translation.zh: ‎而你肯定就是...？

translation.en: -Jason, trainee. -How good are you, Jason?
translation.zh:
‎-杰森 实习生
‎-你怎么样 杰森？

translation.en: -I can be the best, the best ever. -Great.
translation.zh:
‎-我可以是最好的
‎-好的

translation.en: You're practiced at being an elf?
translation.zh: ‎你练好了当精灵吗？

translation.en: I feel like I've got the outfit on and ready to go.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉我已经整装待发了

translation.en: Do you have, like, a... maybe, like, an elf dance?
translation.zh:
‎你可不可以 比如说...
‎跳一个精灵舞蹈？

translation.en: That'd be great.
translation.zh: ‎那很棒

translation.en: Yeah, let's see that.
translation.zh: ‎是的 让我们看看

translation.en: -Okay. -[Terry] And sort make,
translation.zh:
‎-好的
‎-然后带来

translation.en: -like a song, an original song. -Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎比如 一首原创歌曲

translation.en: -Caw caw caw! -That'd be--
-[Terry chuckles] -Not mine. -[Terry] Hang on. -Wow.
translation.zh:
‎-不是我的
‎-等一下

translation.en: Sorry, I brought these for the orphans.
translation.zh:
‎-哇
‎-我给孤儿们买了这些

translation.en: They look like the one you had before.
translation.zh: ‎它们看上去像你以前的那个

translation.en: -Damn it. -Ready?
translation.zh:
‎-可恶
‎-准备好了？

translation.en: -Let's do it. -Come here, listen to Santa.
translation.zh:
‎-开始吧
‎-来吧 听圣诞老人的话

translation.en: He'll tell you what's going on.
translation.zh: ‎他会告诉你有什么情况

translation.en: -Ho ho ho! -Stand right here, next to Santa.
translation.zh:
‎请站在这里
‎站在圣诞老人旁边

translation.en: My little elf helper has arrived.
translation.zh: ‎我的小精灵帮手已经到了

translation.en: Okay, don't be distracted by all this Christmas crap.
translation.zh: ‎不要被所有圣诞的杂事分心了

translation.en: You're here for threat assessment. Keep your eyes peeled for any danger.
translation.zh:
‎你是来这里进行威胁评估的
‎要留意任何危险

translation.en: -Terry, can I talk to you for a second? -Yep.
translation.zh:
‎-我可以和你聊一下吗？
‎-好的

translation.en: Alright, Terry, I really need tonight to go smoothly.
translation.zh: ‎我真的需要今晚可以平稳地度过

translation.en: No problems. I'm down in the polls, I can't take negative PR.
translation.zh:
‎没问题 ‎我在选举投票中落后
‎我不能接受负面的公关

translation.en: Mayor Palmer, don't you worry about it, okay?
translation.zh:
‎我在选举投票中落后
‎我不能接受负面的公关 ‎你不要担心了 好吗？

translation.en: Nothing's going to go wrong. Terry Seattle is on the case!
translation.zh:
‎一切都会没问题的
‎特里·西雅图正在处理着这一切

translation.en: Here we go.
translation.zh: ‎没事了

translation.en: Oh, my God, Jason! I leave you alone for two seconds, and Santa gets shivved?
translation.zh:
‎哦 我的天啊 我就让你一个人待了
‎两秒钟 然后圣诞老人被捅了？

translation.en: I didn't do it. I-- uh... Should we take it out?
translation.zh:
‎不是我做的
‎我们应该把它取出来吗？

translation.en: -Seems like he might still be alive. -Oh, my God. Santa!
translation.zh:
‎-看上去他还活着
‎-圣诞老人！

translation.en: -Santa, what happened? -Someone stabbed me with a candy cane.
translation.zh:
‎-圣诞老人 发生了什么事？
‎-有人用拐杖糖捅我

translation.en: That part is so apparent, Santa, and sticking out of your chest.
translation.zh:
‎这方面是显而易见的 圣诞老人
‎它穿透了你的胸前

translation.en: Who did it?
translation.zh: ‎是谁干的？

translation.en: [groaning] Butter.
translation.zh: ‎黄油

translation.en: -Butter? -Butter?
translation.zh:
‎-黄油？
‎-黄油？

translation.en: He said "butter" as his last words.
translation.zh: ‎他说的最后一个词是黄油

translation.en: What does that mean? Does that mean anything to you?
translation.zh:
‎那是什么意思？
‎有什么含义吗？

translation.en: You look like you consume a lot of butter.
translation.zh: ‎你看上去像是吃了很多黄油

translation.en: I've been trying to cut down on that.
translation.zh:
‎-我一直尝试着减少吃那个
‎-天啊

translation.en: -Oh God! Johnny. -Johnny?
translation.zh:
‎-我一直尝试着减少吃那个
‎-天啊 ‎-约翰尼
‎-约翰尼？

translation.en: -Johnny... -Johnny, who-- Here, take off the beard.
translation.zh:
‎-约翰尼...
‎-约翰尼 你...把胡子摘下来

translation.en: [Jason] Oh, Jesus. You dragged Sean Hayes into this?
translation.zh:
‎天啊
‎你把肖恩·海耶斯卷进来了？

translation.en: Man. Legendary quarterback John Blaze, Hall of Famer.
translation.zh:
‎天啊 传奇四分卫
‎约翰·布雷泽 名人堂成员 ‎约翰尼本来要帮忙把礼物送给孤儿们

translation.en: Johnny was gonna help deliver presents to the orphans.
translation.zh: ‎约翰尼本来要帮忙把礼物送给孤儿们

translation.en: Then throw a football over the orphanage.
translation.zh: ‎然后把一个橄榄球抛过孤儿院

translation.en: Well, looks like his life plans got intercepted.
translation.zh:
‎哎 看起来像
‎他的人生计划被 “拦截” 了

translation.en: -That's wonderful. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-用词很棒
‎-谢谢你

translation.en: Is he still alive a little bit? He might need mouth to mouth.
translation.zh:
‎他还活着吗？
‎他可能需要人工呼吸

translation.en: -I'd love to. -Let's see if that'll bring him back.
translation.zh:
‎-我可以帮他做人工呼吸
‎-让我们看看那样他会不会醒来

translation.en: -Johnny, -Let's see--
translation.zh:
‎-约翰尼
‎-让我们看看...

translation.en: But now he's turning away from me.
translation.zh: ‎他头转过去了

translation.en: -Get in there. -I've gotta plug and open. Plug and open.
translation.zh:
‎-到这里来
‎-我要捏住鼻子吹气 捏住鼻子吹气

translation.en: -Get him. -Plug and open.
translation.zh:
‎-抓住他
‎-捏住鼻子吹气

translation.en: Is he still holding?
translation.zh: ‎他还坚持着吗？

translation.en: -And opening. -[Palmer] Save him.
translation.zh: ‎然后打开 ‎在我看来 他活得挺好的

translation.en: He seems alive to me. That seemed to do it.
translation.zh: ‎在我看来 他活得挺好的 ‎那似乎做到了

translation.en: Oh, he died again.
translation.zh: ‎他又死了

translation.en: [Terry] Well, we can't say we didn't try. Okay, listen up, everybody.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 必须说我们真地努力过了
‎好吧 听着 所有人

translation.en: Legendary quarterback
translation.zh: ‎传奇四分卫

translation.en: John "Johnny" Blaze was murdered.
translation.zh:
‎（犯罪现场
‎市政厅） ‎约翰· “约翰尼”·
‎布雷泽被谋杀了

translation.en: And his killer... is in this room.
translation.zh: ‎而他的凶手...就在这个房间

translation.en: Mayor Palmer, we have to shut this whole place down.
translation.zh: ‎我们现在要把这里整个封锁起来

translation.en: Oh no, we can't lock down the building.
translation.zh: ‎我们不能封锁这座大楼

translation.en: We have to deliver those presents by Christmas morning.
translation.zh: ‎我们必须在圣诞节早上之前送出礼物

translation.en: -If we don't, it'll be a PR disaster. -How long we got till sunrise?
translation.zh:
‎-否则 就是一个公关灾难
‎-到日出还有多久？

translation.en: -Seven hours, 14 minutes. -Wow, that was so specific.
translation.zh:
‎-7小时14 分钟
‎-哇 这么准确

translation.en: Okay, well, until then, nobody can leave this building.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 到那时
‎没人可以离开这座大楼

translation.en: -Okay? -Fine.
translation.zh:
‎-可以吗？
‎-可以

translation.en: But you better find the killer by dawn,
translation.zh:
‎但是你最好在黎明之前找到凶手
‎不然这些礼物

translation.en: because if those presents don't go to the kids,
translation.zh:
‎但是你最好在黎明之前找到凶手
‎不然这些礼物 ‎送不到孩子的手中
‎我的政治生涯就完蛋了

translation.en: my political career is toast.
translation.zh:
‎送不到孩子的手中
‎我的政治生涯就完蛋了

translation.en: And you better believe if I go down, I'm taking you with me.
translation.zh:
‎而且你最好相信如果我完蛋了
‎我会拉上你陪葬

translation.en: I can't imagine I can go further down than I already am.
translation.zh: ‎我无法想象我会比现在还差劲

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: ‎哦 我的天啊！

translation.en: Grab her a chair. Grab that chair. Let her sit down.
translation.zh:
‎把她的椅子拉过来
‎拉住那个椅子 让她坐下来

translation.en: Sit her right down. Sit down, there she is.
translation.zh:
‎现在坐下来
‎在这里坐好 该死

translation.en: We're trapped! I can't do this! We're all gonna die!
translation.zh:
‎我们被困住了！我不行了！
‎我们要死了！

translation.en: She's having a panic attack. You gotta calm her down.
translation.zh:
‎她的恐慌症发作了
‎让她冷静下来

translation.en: You gotta calm down.
translation.zh: ‎冷静一下

translation.en: -♪ Sweet little baby, don't you cry ♪ -[shrieking]
translation.zh: ‎可爱的小宝贝 你不要哭

translation.en: No, you are the worst at this. Do something calmer.
translation.zh:
‎不 你在这方面是最糟糕的
‎做点平静的事

translation.en: She can't -- Oh no, no, no.
translation.zh: ‎不 不 不

translation.en: I just want to go home and be with Mr. Whiskers.
translation.zh:
‎我只想回家
‎和胡须先生在一起

translation.en: -Who's Mr. Whiskers? -My kitty.
translation.zh:
‎-胡须先生是谁？
‎-我的猫

translation.en: -He always calms my fragile nerves. -Well, you're an actor.
translation.zh:
‎-它总能安抚我脆弱的神经
‎-对了 你是个演员

translation.en: -Be a kitty? -Yeah. Mr. Whiskers can't be here
translation.zh:
‎-当一只小猫
‎-是的 胡须先生不能来这里

translation.en: -but we do have Master Bateman. -Mr. Bateman.
translation.zh:
‎-但我们有贝特曼少爷
‎-贝特曼先生

translation.en: Just get on all fours like a cat. Get on all fours and be a kitty.
translation.zh:
‎像猫一样四肢着地
‎四肢着地 当一只小猫

translation.en: [Terry] There you go. There you go.
translation.zh:
‎就这样
‎就这样

translation.en: [Angie] He is kind of nice. Come on, jump up.
translation.zh: ‎他有点温柔 ‎来吧 跳上来

translation.en: There we go, just lean across her.
translation.zh: ‎那里 就靠着她

translation.en: -There's a soft side of me. -Clean. Clean.
translation.zh:
‎-我也有温柔的一面
‎-舔干净 舔干净

translation.en: There we go. Little kitty. What else--
translation.zh:
‎就这样
‎小猫咪 还有什么...

translation.en: You want some milk, don't you?
translation.zh: ‎你想要一个碟子和牛奶？

translation.en: -Yes, please. -Milk!
translation.zh:
‎-是的
‎-牛奶！

translation.en: Right down-- There we go.
translation.zh: ‎就在这里...来了

translation.en: There he is, he'll get down on all fours in the milk. Here we go.
translation.zh:
‎他在那里 他会低下来
‎在牛奶中四肢着地 开始了

translation.en: And then get right in there, okay. And eyes up. Eyes up.
translation.zh:
‎然后在那里趴好 好的
‎而且眼睛向上 眼睛向上

translation.en: -[Jason] Mmm, almond. [laughs] -Eyes up. Lick it eyes up.
translation.zh:
‎-是杏仁
‎-眼睛向上 眼睛向上地舔它

translation.en: There we go.
translation.zh: ‎就这样

translation.en: -[exhales] I'm feeling better. -Okay, good.
translation.zh:
‎-我感觉好多了
‎-好的 很好

translation.en: -Thank you, detective. -Good.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你
‎-好的

translation.en: -You're a saint. -You got it.
translation.zh:
‎-你是个圣人
‎-你说得对

translation.en: [Terry] Get up, you're embarrassing yourself!
translation.zh:
‎站起来
‎你在给自己难堪

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: ‎你在做什么？

translation.en: God, that's humiliating.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 太丢人了

translation.en: Payback's gonna be tough.
translation.zh: ‎报复将会很严厉

translation.en: -Yeah. -I got a long time to think about it.
translation.zh:
‎-是的
‎-我有很长的时间可以思考这个

translation.en: [officer] Lock it up. No one comes in or out.
translation.zh:
‎把它锁起来
‎没有人可以进出

translation.en: All right, listen. You were there when Santa got murdered.
translation.zh:
‎哎 当圣诞老人被杀的时候
‎你在那里

translation.en: You remember anything? You hear any unusual sound?
translation.zh:
‎你记得什么吗？
‎你听到什么不寻常的声音吗？

translation.en: I just remember a little bit of a squeal.
translation.zh: ‎我只记得一点尖叫声

translation.en: -A squeal? -Yep.
translation.zh:
‎-尖叫声？
‎-是的

translation.en: That was all? You didn't hear any other sound?
translation.zh: ‎你没有听到任何其他的声音？

translation.en: -You didn't hear-- -I think I did hear...
translation.zh:
‎-你没有听到...
‎-我想我确实听到了...

translation.en: Yes, I did. There were three bells and then the lights came on.
translation.zh:
‎是的 我听到了 那有三个铃声
‎然后灯亮了

translation.en: -You heard three bells? I'm not crazy? -Maybe it was five. It was... ching ching.
translation.zh:
‎-你听到了三个铃声？不是我疯了？
‎-或许有五个铃声

translation.en: Like a Christmas type of shaky thing.
translation.zh: ‎就像圣诞节摇铃那样的东西

translation.en: All right, let's examine the body, shall we?
translation.zh:
‎好的
‎让我们检查一下尸体？

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-好的
‎-好的

translation.en: [gasps] Gosh. Amber at point.
translation.zh:
‎天啊
‎安柏到了

translation.en: -You got here quick. -I came as soon as I heard.
translation.zh:
‎-你来得挺快
‎-我一听说就来了

translation.en: Amber Kang, forensics.
translation.zh: ‎安柏康 法医

translation.en: This is homicide trainee, Jason Bateman, in an elf costume.
translation.zh:
‎这是刑事案实习生
‎杰森·贝特曼 穿着精灵服装

translation.en: Let's take a look. Whaddya think, J?
translation.zh:
‎看一下
‎你怎么认为？

translation.en: -Pop down here real quick. -Yep.
translation.zh:
‎-快点下来
‎-是的

translation.en: Amber, how was Santa killed with just a candy cane?
translation.zh:
‎安柏 圣诞老人
‎是如何被一个拐杖糖杀死的？

translation.en: By it being sharpened to a fine peppermint point.
translation.zh: ‎通过把它打磨到一个细薄荷点状

translation.en: -You see how smooth that taper is? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-你看到那个锥度有多光滑吗？
‎-是的

translation.en: You can't get that with a knife.
translation.zh: ‎用刀子可做不到这样

translation.en: You can only get that by licking it.
translation.zh: ‎你只能通过舔才能达到这种程度

translation.en: It in order to lick that much...
translation.zh: ‎可以舔成这种程度...

translation.en: -must have loved mint. -And licking.
translation.zh:
‎-一定很喜欢薄荷
‎-和舔东西

translation.en: I guess, and licking, too.
translation.zh: ‎我猜 还有舔东西

translation.en: A Santa hater, but a great licker.
translation.zh:
‎一个讨厌圣诞老人的人
‎但是一个很会舔的人

translation.en: Why don't you examine the rest of the body?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么不检查一下尸体？

translation.en: See if there's anything you can find here.
translation.zh: ‎看看你能否在这里找到什么线索

translation.en: -Is there anything here? -We've got-- hang on a second.
translation.zh:
‎-这里有什么吗？
‎-等一下

translation.en: -[Jason] We've got somebody's name tag. -[Terry] Let me grab it.
translation.zh:
‎-我们找到某个人的名牌
‎-让我拿一下

translation.en: The name is smudged.
translation.zh: ‎名字被弄脏了

translation.en: It's possible that, that is the name tag of the person Santa was struggling with.
translation.zh:
‎这有可能是和圣诞老人扭打的
‎那个人的名牌

translation.en: That he grabbed it off of whoever killed him.
translation.zh: ‎他从那个杀他的人身上拽下来的

translation.en: Mayor, can you think of anybody here who had a relationship with Johnny Blaze?
translation.zh:
‎市长 你能想到这里
‎有谁和约翰尼·布雷泽有关系吗？

translation.en: Yeah, there is one.
translation.zh: ‎是的 有一个

translation.en: Jim Trentley.
translation.zh: ‎吉姆·特伦特利

translation.en: -Jim Trentley?! -Absolutely.
translation.zh:
‎-吉姆·特伦特利?
‎-绝对是他

translation.en: Sports reporter from Channel Five News?
translation.zh: ‎第五频道的体育主播？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Do you know Jim?
translation.zh:
‎-是的
‎-你认识吉姆？

translation.en: -I love his show. -The two of them were really close.
translation.zh:
‎-我喜欢他的节目
‎-他们两人关系密切

translation.en: So Jim's in the bar, he's pretty shaken up.
translation.zh:
‎所以他在酒吧里
‎他摇摇晃晃的

translation.en: Jim's in the bar.
translation.zh: ‎吉姆在酒吧里

translation.en: Sounds like we got ourselves our first suspect.
translation.zh: ‎听上去我们找到了一个嫌疑人

translation.en: Mr. Trentley.
translation.zh: ‎特伦特利先生

translation.en: [chuckles] Only my wife's divorce attorney calls for Mr. Trentley.
translation.zh:
‎只有我妻子的离婚律师
‎叫我特伦特利先生

translation.en: Call me Jim.
translation.zh: ‎叫我吉姆吧

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh, well.
translation.zh:
‎(一号嫌疑犯
‎体育记者)

translation.en: Senior Detective Terry Seattle.
translation.zh: ‎我是高级侦探特里·西雅图

translation.en: Big fan, and sorry about your divorce.
translation.zh:
‎你的忠实粉丝
‎对你的离婚感到抱歉

translation.en: Yeah, it's fine.
translation.zh: ‎是的 没关系

translation.en: Hey, I got myself a new little lady, and she has got a pair
translation.zh:
‎嘿 我找到一个新的小女人
‎而且她有一双

translation.en: of magic hands, if you know what I'm talking about.
translation.zh: ‎神奇的手 你懂吧？

translation.en: [Terry] Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好吧

translation.en: Jason's got some questions here that he needs to ask you.
translation.zh: ‎他有问题想要问你

translation.en: Just routine stuff.
translation.zh: ‎只是常规问题

translation.en: That's funny, because, I'm usually the one
translation.zh: ‎很好笑 因为 通常我是那个

translation.en: asking the questions.
translation.zh: ‎提问题的人

translation.en: Hey, hey. What do you think your team did, huh?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 嘿 你觉得你的队怎么样？

translation.en: -You think you'll make it into playoffs? -[all laugh]
translation.zh: ‎你觉得你们可以挺进季后赛吗？

translation.en: Hey! This is what we're going to do.
translation.zh:
‎嘿！
‎那是我们将要做的事情

translation.en: Okay? You're going to ask the question.
translation.zh:
‎好的？
‎你来提问吧

translation.en: You're an interviewer. That's the microphone.
translation.zh:
‎你是一个采访者
‎那是麦克风

translation.en: You're going to be cameraman, big man, cameraman.
translation.zh:
‎你一定是摄影师
‎一个大块头摄影师

translation.en: -Here he comes. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-来了
‎-好的

translation.en: That's your camera.
translation.zh: ‎这是你的摄像机

translation.en: We're going to do a classic, old school locker room interview, all right?
translation.zh:
‎我们要做一个经典的 老式的
‎更衣室采访 好吗？

translation.en: -I'm going to get ready. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-我要准备好
‎-好的

translation.en: Boy, he's a character, huh?
translation.zh:
‎-天啊 他真有个性
‎-不要喝我的薄荷杜松子酒！

translation.en: -[Jim] Don't drink my peppermint schnapps! -Don't know how this is gonna go.
translation.zh:
‎-天啊 他真有个性
‎-不要喝我的薄荷杜松子酒！ ‎不知道这个将会如果进展

translation.en: -He seems... You got your-- -Go over a few questions.
translation.zh:
‎-他看上去... 你有...
‎-回答几个问题

translation.en: -You got some questions there? -Should I run--
translation.zh:
‎-你那里有几个问题？
‎-我应该...

translation.en: -[Jim] Okay, I'm ready! -I guess you could--
translation.zh:
‎-我准备好了！
‎-我猜你可以...

translation.en: Let's roll camera!
translation.zh: ‎打开摄像机！

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好的

translation.en: -Oh, boy. Hey... -Hey there.
translation.zh:
‎-兄弟 嘿...
‎-嘿 伙计

translation.en: Folks, thanks for hanging out. I was just hitting the showers.
translation.zh:
‎伙计们 感谢你们的光临
‎我刚正在洗澡

translation.en: You know?
translation.zh: ‎你懂的

translation.en: Like a locker room interview.
translation.zh: ‎这像是一个更衣室采访

translation.en: You got some questions for me?
translation.zh: ‎你有问题要问我？

translation.en: Can you describe your relationship with Johnny Blaze?
translation.zh: ‎形容一下你和约翰尼的关系

translation.en: Johnny Blaze and I met 15 years ago, became golfing buddies.
translation.zh:
‎约翰尼·布雷泽和我相识于15年前
‎成为了高尔夫球友

translation.en: -You played golf with Johnny Blaze? -Yes, I did. Every Thursday.
translation.zh:
‎-你和约翰尼·布雷泽打高尔夫？
‎-是的 每周四

translation.en: [chuckles] Johnny always won.
translation.zh: ‎约翰尼总是赢

translation.en: I got a hell of a drive, but my short game's for crap.
translation.zh:
‎我挥杆很在行
‎但是我的短距离推杆很差劲

translation.en: You know, it's my putter! That's why I lost all that money to him.
translation.zh:
‎你懂吗 是我的推杆
‎这是我总是把钱输给他的原因

translation.en: You know, and whatever I owed him, it would just go on my tab.
translation.zh:
‎你懂吗 是我的推杆
‎这是我总是把钱输给他的原因 ‎而且无论我欠他多少钱
‎都只会记在欠条上

translation.en: How much money did you lose to Johnny?
translation.zh: ‎你一共输了多少钱？

translation.en: Well...
[stammering] About $9 million.
translation.zh: ‎差不多900万元

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: ‎哇

translation.en: -You lost $9 million to Johnny Blaze? -It was my damn putter.
translation.zh:
‎-你输了900万元？
‎-是我那该死的推杆

translation.en: I could never get-- my short game's for crap.
translation.zh: ‎我在短距离推杆就是很差劲

translation.en: -Yeah, I don't know, golf's hard... -Roger that.
translation.zh:
‎-是 我不知道 高尔夫很难...
‎-收到

translation.en: Was the money that you owed a source of tension between you two?
translation.zh: ‎你欠的钱是你们关系紧张的原因吗？

translation.en: -$9 million, safe to bet it was. -Tension.
translation.zh:
‎-当然
‎-紧张

translation.en: Come on, now.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 现在

translation.en: We would never let money get in between us, boy.
translation.zh:
‎我们从不让钱牵扯到我们两个
‎真是的

translation.en: Even when he called in the whole debt, recently.
translation.zh: ‎即使是他最近要求还债了

translation.en: Um... he called in the debt?
translation.zh: ‎即使是他最近要求还债了 ‎他要求还债了？

translation.en: Oh yeah, of course he did. Last week he called in the debt.
translation.zh:
‎是的 当然要求了
‎上周他要求还债了

translation.en: Said he needed the cash for some business ventures he was doing, you know?
translation.zh:
‎说他需要一些现金投入到
‎他正在从事的商业风险项目中

translation.en: And, you know, when you think about it, me not owing him $9 million
translation.zh:
‎而且 当你想一下
‎我不再欠他900万元

translation.en: is really the only positive thing to come out of this whole sad event.
translation.zh:
‎这真的是整个悲惨事件中
‎唯一积极的事情

translation.en: What you're saying is you recognize that you would have had... take some deep bends.
translation.zh:
‎你说的是你意识到你本来可以...
‎做一下下弯

translation.en: Him, now dead, you would no longer need to...
translation.zh:
‎他 现在死了
‎你可以不再需要...

translation.en: uh, pay him the $9 million.
translation.zh: ‎偿还给他900万元了

‎而且不害怕做这个

‎-你想要签名？
‎-我想要一个

‎-拿去
‎-他自己准备好了

‎-特-里
‎-致我最好的朋友 托比·斯凯德尔

‎-拿去
‎-差不多了

‎快说吧

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Oh, God!

translation.en: You're a good hugger.

‎在艰难的开始之后 杰森和我
‎最终成为了默契的合作伙伴

‎我们准备追查更多嫌疑人
‎但是命运和帕尔默市长

translation.en: had other plans.
translation.zh: ‎却有其他的计划

translation.en: Where have you two been?
translation.zh: ‎你们两个去哪里了？

translation.en: -[Jason] Well... -[Terry] Uh... Sorry, it took a second
translation.zh:
‎你们两个去哪里了？ ‎-这个...
‎-不好意思 耽误了一会

translation.en: just to convince Jim to put his clothes back on, it got dicey.
translation.zh:
‎说服吉姆穿上他的衣服
‎这有点冒险

translation.en: We're here at your service, we're really on top of this.
translation.zh:
‎我们在这里随时候命
‎我们真的在掌控者这一切

translation.en: Are you? It seems clear to me you're not able to handle this on your own.
translation.zh:
‎我们在这里随时候命
‎我们真的在掌控者这一切 ‎在我看来你们自己处理不了这个案子

translation.en: -Well... -We're doing our best.
translation.zh:
‎-这个...
‎-我们努力做到最好

translation.en: -We are... -I don't think so.
translation.zh: ‎我不这么认为

translation.en: -And that's why I've called in backup. -[Terry] What?
translation.zh:
‎-这也是为什么我找了支援
‎-什么？

translation.en: No, no, no. Come on, Mayor. Last thing I need is another idiot
translation.zh:
‎不 不 不 算了吧
‎我最不需要的就是另一个傻瓜了

translation.en: -that I got to babysit up in here. -Boy.
translation.zh:
‎-我需要在这里当保姆
‎-天啊

translation.en: -Okay? -I'm excited.
translation.zh:
‎-是吗？
‎-我很兴奋

translation.en: -Well. -Come on out, Maya.
translation.zh:
‎-好吧
‎-过来吧 玛雅

translation.en: This is such a mistake.
translation.zh: ‎这是一个错误

translation.en: Here you go.
translation.zh: ‎你去吧

translation.en: -Stand right here, please. -Okay. Hi.
translation.zh:
‎-在这里站着
‎-好的 嗨

translation.en: Detective, Jason. This is Maya Rudolph. She's on your team now.
translation.zh:
‎这是玛雅·鲁道夫
‎她和你在一个小组里了

translation.en: -Incredible to meet you. -Great to meet you.
translation.zh:
‎-很高兴遇见你
‎-很开心遇到你

translation.en: -Hi. -Senior Detective Terry Seattle.
translation.zh:
‎-你好
‎-高级侦探特里·西雅图

translation.en: -Maya Rudolph. -Maya.
translation.zh:
‎-玛雅·鲁道夫
‎-玛雅

translation.en: I need all of you to find the killer and close this case.
translation.zh:
‎我需要你们所有人
‎找到凶手 然后结案

translation.en: -You understand? -Yeah, got it.
translation.zh:
‎-你们明白吗？
‎-明白

translation.en: Great. Now, Terry, you have five hours before the sun rises and your career sets.
translation.zh:
‎好的 现在 特里 在日出前你还有
‎五个小时 否则就是职业生涯的结束

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: ‎哇

translation.en: -Thought it'd be another-- -Super menacing.
translation.zh:
‎-以为会是另一个...
‎-超级来势汹汹

‎-五个小时？很多时间
‎-所以你们一起共事

translation.zh: ‎现在我们一起共事了？

‎-你的直觉告诉你什么？
‎-没什么 刚到这里

‎-圣诞老人死了
‎-让我来告诉你

translation.en: -Really, Santa Claus is dead? -Tell her what's happened.
translation.zh:
‎-圣诞老人死了？
‎-告诉她发生了什么事

translation.zh:
‎给你20秒时间
‎开始吧

translation.zh:
‎-约翰尼·布雷泽...
‎-是的

translation.en: -...was a football player. -Okay.
translation.zh: ‎...是一名橄榄球运动员

translation.en: He's now dead. He was playing Santa.
translation.zh:
‎他现在死了
‎他当时正扮演着圣诞老人

translation.en: -Okay. -So, Santa
translation.zh:
‎-是的
‎-所以 圣诞老人

translation.en: -was killed by a sharp candy cane... -Object? Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-被一个尖锐的拐杖糖杀死了...
‎-凶器？好吧

translation.en: ...that was made into a point through licking.
translation.zh: ‎...它是通过舔形成的

translation.en: -That was made sharp from licking? -Lick made the point.
translation.zh:
‎-那是舔尖的？
‎-舔成尖的

translation.en: Lick made the point, Santa's dead, Johnny Blaze is not dead, though.

‎舔成尖的 圣诞老人死了
‎约翰尼·布雷泽却没死

translation.zh:
‎约翰尼·布雷泽死了 ‎约翰尼·布雷泽死了
‎而且那有一个裸体的体育主播

translation.en: Johnny Blaze is dead. And there was a naked sports caster.
translation.zh:
‎约翰尼·布雷泽死了
‎而且那有一个裸体的体育主播

translation.en: He's a ginger, too. He seemed pretty guilty.
translation.zh:
‎-他是个红毛
‎-他似乎有罪

translation.en: -The naked guy? -Yeah! And drunk,
translation.zh:
‎-一个赤裸的家伙？
‎-是的！ ‎还醉酒呢
‎而且他欠约翰尼·布雷泽

translation.en: -and he owed Johnny Blaze $9 million. -[gasps]
translation.zh:
‎还醉酒呢
‎而且他欠约翰尼·布雷泽 ‎900万元

translation.en: -We don't know who killed Santa? -Why we're here.

translation.en: -We're gonna figure it out. -Obviously.
translation.zh: ‎那是我们需要查清的

translation.en: Okay. I feel I'm up to speed. I don't know where we are.

‎显然 我感觉一切太快了
‎我不知道我们到哪一步了

‎我们现在到哪一步了？
‎告诉她

‎-不 市长在哪里工作？
‎-市长在大城市工作 是吧？

translation.en: In any city, where does the mayor--

translation.en: -City Hall. -There we go.
translation.zh:
‎-市政厅
‎-这就对了

translation.en: I gotta tell you something, this is a disaster.

translation.en: -No. -Why?
translation.zh:
‎-不
‎-为什么？

translation.en: Hello? I'm calling for Johnny Blaze.
translation.zh: ‎我替约翰尼·布雷泽打电话

translation.en: I need to cancel his massage appointment tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎取消他明天的按摩预约

translation.en: No, he's not rescheduling.

translation.en: Did you just hear that? She works for Johnny Blaze.

‎你听到了吗？
‎她为约翰尼·布雷泽服务

translation.en: We need to go and see what she knows.
translation.zh:
‎我们需要去一趟
‎看看她知道什么事情

translation.en: About Johnny. Yep, let's do it.
translation.zh:
‎关于约翰尼
‎是的 我们走吧

translation.en: Obviously about Johnny, not what she knows about other stuff.
translation.zh:
‎显然是关于约翰尼
‎而不是她知道的其他东西

translation.en: And we don't know who killed him?
translation.zh: ‎我们还不知道是谁杀了他？

translation.en: We got to find out because otherwise the orphans
translation.zh:
‎我们必须查清楚
‎否则孤儿们

translation.en: aren't going to get their toys, and then
translation.zh: ‎就得不到他们的玩具了

translation.en: the other thing that'll get murdered is the spirit of Christmas.
translation.zh:
‎就得不到他们的玩具了 ‎然后另一样将被谋杀的就会是
‎圣诞精神

translation.en: It's true. All these gifts are for the orphans.

translation.en: "Get murdered."
translation.zh: ‎“被谋杀”

translation.en: Okay. Okay, cool.
translation.zh: ‎好的 好 酷

translation.en: [Terry] We put suspect number two in an office
translation.zh: ‎我们把二号嫌疑人放在办公室

translation.en: to sweat for a bit before interrogating her.
translation.zh: ‎在审问之前令她紧张

translation.en: But getting her to talk would be our toughest mission yet.
translation.zh:
‎但让她供出消息
‎将是我们迄今为止最艰巨的任务

translation.zh:
‎哦 天啊 谁能告诉我
‎为什么把我关在这里吗？

translation.en: First, let's just get the intros out of the way.
translation.zh: ‎首先 让我们先进行介绍

translation.en: I am Senior Detective Terry Seattle.
translation.zh: ‎我是高级侦探特里·西雅图

translation.en: We're going to start right at the beginning here. What is your name?
translation.zh: ‎我们将从这里开始 你的姓名？

translation.en: I'm Mia Briggs, and I was Johnny's personal assistant.
translation.zh:
‎我是米娅·布里格斯
‎约翰尼的私人助理

translation.en: -How come you're wearing his name tag? -I was gonna ask.
translation.zh:
‎-你佩戴约翰尼的名牌吗？
‎-我也想问

translation.en: This is actually mine. Johnny said remembering the name Mia was impossible,
translation.zh:
‎这是我的
‎约翰尼说无法记住我的名字

translation.en: -so he just called me Johnny. -We're gonna ask you about Johnny.
translation.zh:
‎-所以他就叫我约翰尼
‎-我们问你一些有关约翰尼的情况

translation.en: -I can't answer anything. -Why not?
translation.zh:
‎-无可奉告
‎-怎么了？

translation.en: I signed an ironclad NDA. Can't answer anything that has to do with him.
translation.zh:
‎签署了一份绝对的保密协议
‎不能回答与他有关的任何问题

translation.en: -Ironclad NDA? Not a regular NDA? -It was very intense.
translation.zh:
‎-绝对保密协议？非常规保密协议？
‎-这是非常严密的 ‎没有时间深入了解这一点

translation.en: We don't have time to get to the bottom of this.
translation.zh: ‎没有时间深入了解这一点

translation.en: We're going to do something I call good cop, bad cop, Terry style.
translation.zh:
‎我们要做点事情 ‎我称之为
‎“好警察 坏警察 特里风格”

translation.en: Jason, you're a good cop. Maya, you're a bad cop.
translation.zh: ‎你将会是好警察 你是坏警察

translation.en: If things don't work out, switch roles. So look for cues.
translation.zh:
‎进展不顺利 我们就换角色 ‎寻找线索
‎你是好的 你是坏的

translation.en: -You're good. -You're good, you're bad.
translation.zh:
‎寻找线索
‎你是好的 你是坏的

translation.en: You're gonna be answering questions right now!
translation.zh: ‎你要回答一些问题

translation.en: -Hey, Mia. -Right here.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 米娅
‎-在这

translation.en: [Mia] I'm gonna sit, but not talk.
translation.zh: ‎我要坐下来 不过我不讲话

translation.en: Okay, let's see about that.
translation.zh: ‎让我们倒是看看

translation.en: -Get over here. -Let's see about that.
translation.zh:
‎-到这里来
‎-让我们倒是看看

translation.en: -Right here. Good cop, bad, go! -You look awesome today,
translation.zh:
‎-就在这 好警察 坏警察 走吧！
‎-你今天看起来很棒

translation.en: That color's very pretty on your complexion.
translation.zh: ‎这种颜色配你的肤色非常漂亮

translation.en: When's the last time you saw your boss alive?
translation.zh:
‎你最后一次看到你活着的老板
‎是什么时候？

translation.en: This morning.
translation.zh: ‎今天早晨

translation.en: -Yeah, you murder him? -I can't talk about him.
translation.zh:
‎-你谋杀了他？
‎-我不能谈论他

translation.en: I don't even know why I answered those.
translation.zh: ‎我不明白我为什么要回答这些

translation.en: Defensive much?
translation.zh: ‎防御性很强吗？

translation.en: -You don't want to get her upset? -Switch it.
translation.zh:
‎-你不会想让她生气吧？
‎-交换角色

translation.en: You're gonna answer the question
translation.zh: ‎回答这个问题否则你会

translation.en: or you're going to get carted out of here on a stretcher.
translation.zh: ‎回答这个问题否则你会 ‎被担架抬出这里

translation.en: -I'm not answering. -Sweetie, I just have a couple questions.
translation.zh:
‎-无可奉告
‎-我要问你问题

translation.en: -I love your sweater. -We need something helpful from you.
translation.zh:
‎-我喜欢你的毛衣
‎-我们需要一些有用的东西

translation.en: I can't talk about him.
translation.zh: ‎我不能谈论他

translation.en: We got to try new kinds of cops.
translation.zh: ‎我们必须尝试新类型的警察

translation.en: Maya, French cop, Jason, Italian cop.
translation.zh: ‎玛雅 法国警察 杰森 意大利警察

translation.en: Mia... [speaks French]
Smoke.
translation.zh: ‎吸烟

translation.en: Forget about it.
translation.zh: ‎忘掉它

translation.en: [Italian accent] Forget about it! What you think you know?
translation.zh: ‎忘掉它！ ‎你以为你知道什么？

translation.en: And tell me what I need to know.
translation.zh: ‎告诉我 我需要知道的东西

translation.en: [French accent] You know what I think? You Americans put too much
translation.zh:
‎你知道我怎么想吗？
‎你们美国人在汉堡包上

translation.en: ketchup on your hamburgers.
translation.zh: ‎放了太多番茄酱

translation.en: At the Olive Garden, when you're here, you're family.
translation.zh:
‎在橄榄园
‎当你在这里时 你就是一家人

translation.en: When you're here...
translation.zh: ‎当你在这里时...

translation.en: Singing cop.
translation.zh: ‎唱歌的警察

translation.en: ♪ Let me ask you a couple of questions ♪
translation.zh: ‎让我问你几个问题

translation.en: ♪ Did you murder your boss? ♪
translation.zh: ‎你谋杀了你的老板？

translation.en: Liam Neeson cop.
translation.zh: ‎连姆·尼森警察

translation.en: -[imitates Liam] I will protect you. -Pretty good!
translation.zh:
‎-我会保护你
‎-非常好！

translation.en: -Pretty good. -Okay, Maya, working class British cop.
translation.zh:
‎-非常好
‎-好的 工人阶级英国警察

translation.en: [British accent] I'm gonna give you five fucking minutes, right?
translation.zh: ‎我会给你他妈的五分钟 对吧？

translation.en: And then you're going to fucking tell me. What the fuck.
translation.zh:
‎然后你他妈的告诉我
‎到底是怎么回事

translation.en: Only speaks in robot sound-bleeps.
translation.zh:
‎-只用机器人声音说话 发哔哔声
‎-好的

translation.en: [imitates robot] Okay. We need...
translation.zh:
‎-只用机器人声音说话 发哔哔声
‎-好的 ‎我们需要...

translation.en: -some answers out of you. -No words, just bleeps.
translation.zh:
‎-你的一些答案
‎-不用说话 只是发出哔哔声

translation.en: Listen, you don't want to get the robot mad.
translation.zh: ‎听着 你不想机器人生气吧

translation.en: -He'll fucking punch you, right? -[robot noise]
translation.zh: ‎他会揍你的 对吧？

translation.en: -Rick Astley cop. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎里克·阿斯特利警察

translation.en: ♪ Never going to arrest you Because you're my best friend ♪
translation.zh:
‎永远不会逮捕你
‎因为你是我最好的朋友

translation.en: ♪ Never going to arrest you, Mia ♪
translation.zh: ‎永远不会逮捕你 米娅

translation.en: -[shouts] Is that enough for you? -I'll talk!
translation.zh:
‎-这够了吗？
‎-我要供出消息了！

translation.en: [normal] There it is.
translation.zh: ‎这就对了

translation.en: -We did it. -You're running point on this.
translation.zh:
‎-我们做到了
‎-你负责带头进行提问

translation.en: Ask about her job working for Johnny.
translation.zh: ‎问她为约翰尼工作的情况

translation.en: -[normal] Yes, I have questions. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-对 我有问题
‎-是的

translation.en: Okay. What were your responsibilities?
translation.zh: ‎好的 你的职责是什么呢？

translation.en: I had his calendar. I would drive him places.
translation.zh:
‎我有他的行程表
‎我会开车送他去各个地方

translation.en: -Okay. -I faked an ADHD condition
translation.zh:
‎我伪造了多动症的证明
‎这样他就能吸食我的加氯醇

translation.en: -so that he could snort my Adderall. -Wait, what?
translation.zh:
‎我伪造了多动症的证明
‎这样他就能吸食我的加氯醇 ‎-等等 什么？
‎-是的

translation.en: One time, he had me drive through a tornado to get to Sam's Club
translation.zh:
‎有一次他让我开车
‎穿过龙卷风去山姆俱乐部

translation.en: because he said, quote, "I need all of the butter."
translation.zh: ‎因为他说：“我需要所有的黄油”

translation.en: -[beeping] -Wait, hang on. Sorry. I have to do this really quick.
translation.zh:
‎等等 等一下 对不起
‎我必须尽快做这件事

translation.en: -What's that? -Okay, so Johnny said that
translation.zh:
‎-那是什么？
‎-好的 约翰尼说

translation.en: my breath smelled like a wet sneaker with gonorrhea.
translation.zh: ‎我的呼吸闻起来像淋病的湿运动鞋

translation.en: So he asked me to spray my mouth with mint every five minutes.
translation.zh: ‎他让我每隔五分钟喷一次薄荷

translation.en: So he said unkind things to you often and you like mint?
translation.zh:
‎所以他经常对你说不友好的话
‎并且你喜欢薄荷？

translation.en: It seems to me-- I'm just going to put this out there...
translation.zh:
‎在我看来...
‎我就直接摊开来说了

‎-不

‎他确实是一位非常出色的老板

translation.zh:
‎-听起来不像
‎-他给我送了礼物

‎-真的吗？
‎-是的 看 这个漂亮的项链

translation.en: -[bells jingling] -He got me this necklace
translation.zh:
‎-真的吗？
‎-是的 看 这个漂亮的项链 ‎项链会发出很大的声响
‎这样他就可以知道我在哪里

translation.en: that makes noise so he can know where I am.
translation.zh:
‎项链会发出很大的声响
‎这样他就可以知道我在哪里

translation.en: Now I know where he is all times.

translation.zh:
‎-他在哪里？
‎-老板天堂

‎足以刺伤他

translation.en: but the circuit breaker for the power is all the way over here.

‎同时关灯并刺伤约翰尼

translation.en: Know what that means?

translation.en: Can I just have a moment with my trainees?

translation.en: Whoever turned off the lights can't be the same person...

translation.en: [both] ...who killed Johnny. Jinx!
translation.zh:
‎杀死约翰尼的那个人
‎想法一致！

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -[both laugh]

translation.en: -What if it's Stretch Armstrong? -The character?
translation.zh:
‎-万一是可拉伸阿姆斯壮呢？
‎-玩偶？

translation.en: The one with the arms that could reach that and stab at the same time.
translation.zh:
‎有这样手臂的人
‎可同时关闭断路器并刺伤

translation.en: You know what this means, right? This means,

translation.en: there's an accomplice. This changes everything.

translation.en: -[deep voice] So what you're saying is... -[both] There's an accomplice.

translation.en: And this accomplice is out here, hiding in plain sight,
translation.zh:
‎而这个同伙就在这里
‎隐藏在众目睽睽之下

‎他们唯一的目标就是试图阻止我们
‎我们不再是猎人

‎-你中风了吗？

translation.zh:
‎-那是谁？
‎-该死 孤儿们

translation.zh:
‎-他们为什么来这里了？
‎-一直等着见圣诞老人

translation.en: -Think. -"Hard Knock Life."

‎-思考一下
‎-《硬敲生活》

‎你们两个 跟我来

translation.en: Please.
translation.zh: ‎请

‎嗨 小朋友们玩得开心吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -What's going on?
translation.zh:
‎-是啊
‎-怎么了？

translation.en: We got him all set here. Let's just get him--
translation.zh:
‎我们把他都安置好了
‎让我们把他...

translation.en: All right. Okay. All right, guys, we got Santa. Come on.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 好吧 伙计们
‎我们有圣诞老人了 来吧

translation.en: -No. -Come on back here.
translation.zh:
‎-噢 不
‎-回来后面吧

translation.en: Hold that. You manage that, and, Jason, you get there.

‎拿着那个 你控制那个
‎你到那里去

translation.en: And Santa's gonna have that moment for a while.

translation.en: [Terry] Santa's ready.

translation.en: Okay. Well, then, come this way, I guess.

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: ‎哇

translation.en: -[Jason as Santa] Hello. -This is great. Come here.
translation.zh:
‎-你们好
‎-太棒了 到这边来

translation.zh:
‎你们好 男孩和女孩
‎你们喜欢礼物吗？喜欢什么？

‎-请坐这里
‎-是的 你们要...来吧

translation.zh:
‎-到这来
‎-你的胡子怎么了？

translation.en: Be sensitive. It's called alopecia.

‎那是肠漏
‎请告诉我你圣诞节的愿望

‎我想要一个新洋娃娃
‎一个美术工具包和一个足球

translation.en: She doesn't get to ask for three things.

‎-不行 就一样
‎-你不能要这么多东西

translation.en: You take what you get and you don't get upset.

‎-怎么了？
‎-你是个爱哭鬼

translation.en: -You're terrible at this. Switch. -Apologies.

‎-你不擅长这个 换一下

‎-请等一下
‎-好的

‎-非常抱歉

‎我是格温·史蒂芬妮

‎-圣诞老人在做嘻哈超人手势
‎-看着我 ‎耶！抖音很酷

‎-我叫特伦斯

‎-我喜欢那个

‎-是妈妈和爸爸

‎永远的妈妈和爸爸

translation.en: -Do you like chocolate? -Yeah!
translation.zh:
‎-你想要巧克力吗？
‎-耶！

‎-吃掉它

‎-谢谢

translation.en: I love you.

translation.en: -[normal] My finger. -I think we're clear.

‎-我的手指
‎-我想我们搞定了

‎-我的手指痛
‎-我们搞定了

‎我没想到我们能够做到这一点

‎这与聚会和降噪耳机无关
‎是关于希望

translation.en: -And we got to give those kids hope. -Yes.

‎-我们给这些孩子带来希望
‎-对

‎我说得对吗？

translation.en: -[all scream] -Jesus Christ.

‎我们要抓住这个凶手 拯救圣诞节
‎我说得对吗？ ‎天啊

translation.en: -My gosh. -She really scared me.

‎-我的天啊
‎-她真的吓坏我了

translation.en: She's just-- this has been a whole thing with Angie.

‎-他必须当一只猫 因为...

translation.en: -Amber, yes. -Terry.

‎-安柏 是的
‎-特里

translation.zh:
‎我对照了
‎约翰尼与聚会宾客名单的关系

translation.en: -looking for connections and I got a hit. -Okay. Donna Foccacia.
translation.zh:
‎寻找关联
‎我找到了提示：唐娜·佛卡西亚

translation.en: -Like the bread? -Exactly.
translation.zh:
‎-像面包品牌那个？
‎-对极了

translation.en: -Really? -She's the brains and money
translation.zh:
‎-真的吗？
‎-她是运动员品牌餐厅

translation.en: behind tons of athlete branded restaurants.
translation.zh: ‎背后的大脑和金主

translation.en: So she's going to help us how?

translation.en: Her and Johnny were collaborating on a project.
translation.zh: ‎她和约翰尼正在做一个项目

translation.en: You'll find her in the VIP lounge.
translation.zh: ‎她在贵宾休息室

translation.en: -The VIP lounge? -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-贵宾休息室？
‎-是的

translation.en: We have an exclusive club, two floors up.
translation.zh: ‎往上两层 我们有一家专属俱乐部

translation.en: -Here? -City Hall's got a VIP lounge?
translation.zh:
‎-在市政厅？
‎-贵宾休息室？

translation.en: Less than two hours before the orphans wake up
translation.zh: ‎离孤儿们起床寻找礼物

translation.en: looking for their presents. Move fast,
translation.zh: ‎不到两个小时了 赶快行动

translation.en: and keep your cell phone on. I want to be in constant contact.

‎你的手机保持开机
‎我要随时保持联系

translation.en: Do you know what this means?
translation.zh: ‎你知道这意味着什么吗？

translation.en: The killer's accomplice is still out there and we got targets on our back.
translation.zh: ‎这个同伙就在这里 我们腹背受敌

translation.en: Like we're hunted?
translation.zh: ‎我们被追踪了？

translation.en: Yeah. If we're going to solve this,
translation.zh: ‎是的 如果我们要解决这一切

translation.en: the only way it's going to happen is that if you two go deep undercover.
translation.zh:
‎实现的唯一方法是
‎你们两个做卧底

translation.en: [Terry] We headed to the VIP lounge with Maya posing as an elite athlete,
translation.zh:
‎我们前往贵宾休息室
‎玛雅假扮一个精英运动员

translation.en: and Jason as her manager.
translation.zh: ‎杰森假扮她的经理

translation.en: We kept an eye out for the accomplice,
translation.zh: ‎我们一直在留意同谋

translation.en: but it turned out their eye was already on us.
translation.zh:
‎但结果却是
‎他们的眼睛已经盯在我们身上了

translation.en: Okay, this is the VIP area.
translation.zh: ‎好了 这就是贵宾区

translation.en: I don't understand why they have a VIP room.
translation.zh: ‎我不明白为什么他们有贵宾室

translation.en: -You two are going in there alone. -[both] What?
translation.zh:
‎你们两个自己进去 ‎-什么？
‎-什么？

translation.en: Don't worry. I'll be with you the entire time.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-什么？ ‎不用担心 我会跟你们一起

translation.en: -Yeah. You gonna pop these in your ears. -Are these drugs?
translation.zh:
‎-是的 你们要把这些塞进耳朵里
‎-这些是毒品吗？

translation.en: No, these are just ear pieces, put one in each of your ear.
translation.zh:
‎不是 这些只是耳塞
‎每个耳朵都放一个

translation.en: You're gonna pitch Donna a restaurant idea
translation.zh: ‎你们要向唐娜推销一个餐厅的想法

translation.en: and try to get her talking about Johnny Blaze.
translation.zh: ‎试图让她谈起约翰尼

translation.en: And I'm going to find a safe place to hide, and I'll talk you through it.
translation.zh:
‎我会找到一个安全的地方
‎隐藏起来 我会告诉你们怎么说

translation.en: -You got it? -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-你们明白了吗？
‎-明白了

translation.en: Get in there.
translation.zh: ‎进去吧

translation.en: Bingo.
translation.zh: ‎瞧吧

translation.en: -[clang] -Motherfucker!
translation.zh: ‎混蛋！

translation.en: [Donna] I said, you can slap a horse's ass but don't expect it to kiss you goodnight.
translation.zh:
‎然后我说 你可以拍马 ‎但不要指望它
‎吻你晚安

translation.en: [Terry on radio] Jason, Maya, can you hear me?
translation.zh: ‎你们能听见我吗？

translation.en: [both] Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-能听见
‎-能听见

translation.en: Let's get to work. Did you find Donna?
translation.zh: ‎让我们开始 你们找到唐娜了吗？

translation.en: -Did you find Donna? -No. Don't repeat that. Did you find her?
translation.zh:
‎-你们找到唐娜了吗？
‎-别重复我的话 ‎-找到她了？
‎-面包小姐？

translation.en: -You talking about the bread lady? -Yes, her.
translation.zh:
‎-找到她了？
‎-面包小姐？ ‎好的 按照我说的行事

translation.en: Do what I tell you to. Wait till she's alone.
translation.zh:
‎好的 按照我说的行事 ‎-等她独自一人时 她是一个人吗？
‎-是的

translation.en: -Is she alone? -[both] Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-等她独自一人时 她是一个人吗？
‎-是的

translation.en: Okay. Go sit next to her.
translation.zh: ‎去坐在她的旁边

translation.en: -Hi, there. -Hi. Hello.
translation.zh:
‎-嗨 你好
‎-嗨 你好

translation.en: Can I help you two or...
translation.zh:
‎我有什么可以帮到你俩
‎还是说...

translation.en: "Good evening, ma'am. I'm sorry to intrude."
translation.zh: ‎“晚上好 很抱歉打扰”

translation.en: -Sorry to intrude. Good evening. -Good evening.
translation.zh: ‎很抱歉打扰 晚上好

translation.en: You're Canadian.
translation.zh: ‎你是加拿大人

translation.en: Heavy accent, like a real maple sucker.
translation.zh:
‎浓重的口音
‎像一个真正的吸吮枫糖的人

translation.en: Oh, and there's a hat under your seat, check.
translation.zh: ‎你的座位下面有顶帽子 看一下

translation.en: [Terry] On the floor. On the floor. There it is.
translation.zh: ‎在地板上 地板上 就在那

translation.en: -[Canadian accent] How's it going, eh? -"Sorry to intrude."

translation.zh:
‎-穿粉裤子的
‎-好的 就是她了

translation.en: But I'm gonna be a dick.
translation.zh: ‎但是我要当一个混蛋

translation.en: I think you're up to something.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得你在搞事情

translation.en: -So, just to recap... -Yep.
translation.zh:
‎-所以 复盘一下...
‎-是的

translation.en: Maya, you think the Mayor did it?
translation.zh: ‎玛雅 你认为是市长做的？

translation.en: The fuck?
translation.zh: ‎搞啥？

translation.en: Jason, you think that he committed suicide?
translation.zh: ‎你认为他是自杀的？

translation.en: I would.
translation.zh: ‎我是这么认为

translation.en: -And Pete, you think I did it? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎然后皮特 你认为是我做的？
‎-是的

translation.en: So we had three suspects, and you chose none of them.
translation.zh:
‎我们有三个嫌疑人
‎你一个都不选

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: ‎是的

translation.en: -Fantastic. -Now what?
translation.zh:
‎-太妙了
‎-现在怎么办？

translation.en: Listen here, there is a mountain of evidence out there.
translation.zh: ‎其实是有一大堆的证据

translation.en: So whoever did commit this murder, please, now is your chance to come clean.
translation.zh:
‎所以 真正的凶手
‎现在给机会你坦白交代

translation.en: You may think that all you've done is killed legendary quarterback Johnny Blaze.
translation.zh:
‎你可能认为你所做的只是
‎杀死了传奇四分卫约翰尼·布雷泽

translation.en: But what you've really done is you've committed the most heinous act of all.
translation.zh:
‎但你真正犯下的是
‎最令人发指的行为

translation.en: If we don't get those presents to those orphans in the next 12 minutes
translation.zh:
‎如果在接下来的12分钟里
‎我们无法把礼物送给那些孤儿们

translation.en: those kids are going to stop believing in Santa
translation.zh: ‎那些孩子就不会再相信圣诞老人了

translation.en: and you will have murdered the spirit of Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎而你则谋杀了圣诞节的精神

translation.en: Who did it?
translation.zh: ‎是谁干的？

translation.en: -I can't take it anymore. -[all gasp]
translation.zh: ‎我再也受不了了

translation.en: It was me, I did it!
translation.zh:
‎-是我 我干的
‎-为什么？

translation.en: -Why? -How the fuck was I supposed to know that? I've never met you before.
translation.zh:
‎这我怎么会知道
‎我之前都没有见过你

translation.en: Legendary Channel Five sports anchor Jim Trentley!
translation.zh:
‎第五频道传奇体育主播
‎吉姆·特伦特利！

translation.en: I didn't have anywhere else to go. I didn't have the money,
translation.zh:
‎我哪里都去不了
‎我也没有钱

translation.en: he was going to tell everybody about my debt, ruin my TV career.
translation.zh:
‎他打算把我欠债的事情告诉所有人
‎毁了我的电视生涯

translation.en: Yes, of course. Of course. It had to be you.
translation.zh:
‎是的 当然了
‎当然了 一定是你

translation.en: Jason heard the sound of jingle bells during the murder.
translation.zh:
‎在谋杀案发生的时候
‎杰森听到了铃铛声音

translation.en: Jim was the one who had that ugly bell sweater.
translation.zh: ‎吉姆是那个穿了丑丑的铃铛毛衣的人

translation.en: -Hey... -Sorry.
Jim was drinking peppermint schnapps.
translation.zh: ‎吉姆当时喝着薄荷杜松子酒

translation.en: We know the killer liked the taste of mint.
translation.zh: ‎我们知道凶手喜欢薄荷的味道

translation.en: Donna sent back her mint julep. She hated it when you were at the bar.
translation.zh: ‎唐娜退回了她的冰镇薄荷酒 ‎她讨厌在酒吧喝那个

translation.en: This a mint julep? I said rum and Mountain Dew, get this shit out.
translation.zh:
‎这是冰镇薄荷酒？我说朗姆酒加激浪
‎把这玩意从我面前拿开

translation.en: Finally there's the name tag issue. Everybody's name tag was smudged.
translation.zh:
‎还有名牌的问题
‎每一个人的名牌都被弄脏了

translation.en: We found the smudged name tag in the hand of Johnny Blaze.
translation.zh:
‎我们在约翰尼·布雷泽的手中
‎找到一个弄脏的名牌

translation.en: Which means the killer must've made a second name tag.
translation.zh: ‎这说明凶手制作了第二个名牌

translation.en: Only one person didn't have a smudged name tag and that was Jim Trentley.
translation.zh:
‎只有一个人的名牌没有弄脏
‎那就是吉姆·特伦特利

translation.en: Call me Jim.
translation.zh: ‎叫我吉姆

translation.en: And his was signed with a brand new red Sharpie
translation.zh:
‎他名牌用全新的红色记号笔
‎签的名字

translation.en: that matched the headshot that you signed for me.
translation.zh: ‎和他给我的签名照是一样的

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: ‎哇

translation.en: I'm going to jail, aren't I?
translation.zh: ‎我要进监狱了 是不是？

translation.en: You're not only going to jail, you're also going to hell.
translation.zh:
‎你不光要进监狱了
‎你还要进地狱了

translation.en: Do they have golf in jail?
translation.zh: ‎监狱里有高尔夫吗？

translation.en: Golf! Of course!
translation.zh: ‎高尔夫！当然！

translation.en: That adds up. We thought Johnny Blaze's last words were "butter."
translation.zh:
‎串起来了 我们认为
‎约翰尼·布雷泽的遗言是 “黄油”

translation.en: -Butter. -But it wasn't "butter." It was "putter."
translation.zh:
‎黄油 ‎但它不是 “黄油”
‎而是 “推杆”

translation.en: -Oh. -Oh, my gosh.
translation.zh: ‎我的天啊

translation.en: -That's a twist. -This guy's crying.
translation.zh:
‎-这是一个转折点
‎-这家伙在哭

translation.en: It's so fucking sad.
translation.zh: ‎太他妈伤心了

translation.en: He was trying to tell us who the killer was.
translation.zh: ‎他试图告诉我们凶手是谁

translation.en: But there was an accomplice.
translation.zh: ‎还有个同伙

translation.en: -Who turned off the lights? -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-是谁关的灯？
‎-谢谢

translation.en: The accomplice was Jim Trentley's new girl, Angie!
translation.zh:
‎同伙是吉姆·特伦特利的新女友
‎安吉

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: ‎什么？

translation.en: Jim told us his lady friend had magic hands.
translation.zh:
‎吉姆告诉我们
‎他的新女伴有一双神奇的手

translation.en: Guess who was wrapping the orphan's presents at lightning speed?
translation.zh:
‎猜猜是谁以闪电般的速度
‎包装孤儿的礼物？

translation.en: She was the one hunting us in the hallway.
translation.zh: ‎她是那个追捕我们的人

translation.en: She wasn't out of breath from a panic attack,
translation.zh:
‎她并没有因为惊恐发作而气喘吁吁
‎而是戴着滑雪面罩

translation.en: but from running the hallways in a ski mask, trying to take us out.
translation.zh: ‎在走廊上跑来跑去试图带我们出去

translation.en: Jim, you idiot! I told you to not talk about my magic hands.
translation.zh:
‎吉姆 你这个白痴！我告诉过你
‎不要谈论我的魔法手

translation.en: -I love you, Boo Boo. -Hey, Jim, why don't you go fuck yourself?
translation.zh:
‎-我爱你 我犯了低级错误
‎-嘿 吉姆 你为什么不杀了自己？

translation.en: Officers, take him away.
translation.zh: ‎警官们 把他带走

translation.en: But nobody even gave me a present. If nobody got it...
translation.zh:
‎但是没有人给我礼物
‎如果没有人收到...

translation.en: Can't I-- That's rude.
translation.zh: ‎我能不能...那太粗鲁了

translation.en: -Well, thanks for having me. -That was crazy. Thank God it's all over.
translation.zh:
‎-哦 谢谢邀请我
‎-那太疯狂了 谢天谢地 可算结束

translation.en: Detective!
translation.zh: ‎侦探！

translation.en: -Uh-oh. -You wanted a present from the table?
translation.zh: ‎你想要桌上的礼物吗？

translation.en: Well, my magic hands wrapped something nice and big for you,
translation.zh:
‎对了 我那双神奇的手为你包裹了
‎一件又大又漂亮的东西

translation.en: and it's going to blow you away!
translation.zh: ‎它会把你炸飞

translation.en: -Oh, no. -[beeping]
translation.zh: ‎不

translation.en: Careful.
translation.zh: ‎小心

translation.en: A real bomb!
translation.zh: ‎一颗真的炸弹！

translation.en: -Look, we need to evacuate. -No time for that.
translation.zh:
‎-听着 我们需要撤离
‎-没时间了

translation.en: This entire building is going to blow.
translation.zh: ‎整座大楼会被炸毁

translation.en: -Fifty-five seconds, MacGruber! -Let me see it.
translation.zh:
‎-55 秒 麦克格鲁伯！
‎-让我看看

translation.en: Oh my God! There are three wires, red, green, and blue.
translation.zh:
‎有三根线
‎红线 绿线和蓝线

translation.en: -Right. -No!
translation.zh:
‎-正确
‎-不要！

translation.en: -You're lucky. -[Jason] Good instincts.
translation.zh:
‎你很幸运... ‎-直觉不错
‎-我们没有准备好

translation.en: We're not prepared for that.
translation.zh:
‎-直觉不错
‎-我们没有准备好

translation.en: Cut the correct wire, the bomb will disarm.
translation.zh:
‎如果你剪断了正确的线
‎炸弹就会拆除

translation.en: If you cut the wrong one, we all die.
translation.zh: ‎如果你剪断了错误的线 我们就死了

translation.en: You seem comfortable with explosives. You have to run point on this.
translation.zh:
‎你似乎对炸药很在行
‎你必须在这方面有所作为

translation.en: Cut the right one, you decide.
translation.zh: ‎剪断正确的线 你决定

translation.en: Consensus. Talk together about what to do.
translation.zh: ‎达成共识 一起讨论该怎么做

translation.en: [Jason] I think maybe red, the pliers are red.
translation.zh:
‎我想可能是红线
‎因为钳子是红色的

translation.en: I think blue because it's the only non Christmas color.
translation.zh:
‎我认为是蓝线
‎因为它不是圣诞节的颜色

translation.en: We're running out of time here.
translation.zh: ‎我们没有多少时间了

translation.en: I'm thinking we just go like, three, two, one, go?
translation.zh:
‎我想我们就这样吧
‎三 二 一 动手？

translation.en: Or do we go one, two, three?
translation.zh: ‎或者我们说一 二 三？

translation.en: -Do we do it on three? -We don't have time for this!
translation.zh:
‎-我们要数到三吗？
‎-我们没有时间讨论这个！

translation.en: Here we go!
translation.zh: ‎开始！

translation.en: Two! One!
translation.zh: ‎二！一！

translation.en: Pete Davidson saved Christmas and saved the day.
translation.zh:
‎皮特·戴维森拯救了圣诞节
‎并挽救了局面

translation.en: You're the hero.
translation.zh: ‎你是英雄

translation.en: [all] Pete, Pete, Pete,
translation.zh: ‎皮特 皮特 皮特

translation.en: Pete, Pete, Pete, Pete, Pete,
translation.zh: ‎皮特 皮特 皮特...

translation.en: -Pete, Pete, Pete! -That was some crazy shit.
translation.zh:
‎-皮特 皮特 皮特！
‎-那可真疯狂

translation.en: -Fantastic. -Wow.
translation.zh:
‎-太棒了
‎-哇

translation.en: Pete, you came in last second, you really saved the day.
translation.zh:
‎你最后一秒出手
‎你真的挽救了局面

translation.en: -Thanks. -[Maya] Good job.
translation.zh:
‎-多谢
‎-干得漂亮

translation.en: You trusted your gut. It's a holiday I'm never gonna forget. I know.
translation.zh:
‎你相信自己的直觉
‎这是一个我永远不会忘记的假期

translation.en: I want to thank you all for coming down here.
translation.zh: ‎我要感谢大家的到来

translation.en: It's been an incredible journey, but...
translation.zh:
‎这是一段不可思议的旅程
‎但是...

translation.en: Thanks so much, Terry.
translation.zh: ‎非常感谢 特里

translation.en: What's wrong, Mayor?
translation.zh: ‎怎么了 市长？

translation.en: Well, the day may be saved, but not the spirit of Christmas.
translation.zh:
‎局面得以挽救
‎不过圣诞节的精神却不一定

translation.en: -God dang it, the orphans. -We only have six minutes to sunrise.
translation.zh:
‎-孤儿们
‎-距离日出还有6分钟了

translation.en: Those kids are about to wake up with no presents at all.
translation.zh: ‎孩子们将在没有礼物的情况下醒来

translation.en: No, they're not. Somebody get me the Santa suit.
translation.zh:
‎不 他们不会的
‎来人给我拿圣诞老人套装

translation.en: I'm dreaming of an orange Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎我梦想着一个橙色的圣诞节

translation.en: On Donnor, on Blitzen, on Rampage!
translation.zh: ‎唐纳 布利岑 横冲直撞！

translation.en: Ho, ho, ho. Merry Christmas!
translation.zh: ‎圣诞快乐！

translation.en: -Santa, you really came! -And your beard grew back!
translation.zh:
‎圣诞老人 你真的来了！
‎你的胡子长回来的！

translation.en: [Terry] Of course I came.
translation.zh: ‎我当然来呀

translation.en: Every good girl and boy deserves a present on Christmas.
translation.zh:
‎每个好女孩和好男孩
‎都应该在圣诞节收到礼物

translation.en: Thank you, Terry. I mean, Santa. You saved Christmas.
translation.zh:
‎谢谢你 特里 应该是圣诞老人
‎你拯救了圣诞节

translation.en: On the contrary, Christmas saved me.
translation.zh: ‎相反 是圣诞节拯救了我

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: ‎什么？

translation.en: "To Terry, from Santa?"
translation.zh:
‎“送给：特里
‎来自：圣诞老人？”

translation.en: It's a Christmas miracle. My noise canceling headphones!
translation.zh:
‎这是一个圣诞奇迹
‎我的降噪耳机！

translation.en: -Where's your present, Terry? -I didn't get one.
translation.zh:
‎-你的礼物在哪里 特里？
‎-我没有

translation.en: I guess Santa felt I didn't deserve one.
translation.zh:
‎我猜圣诞老人
‎觉得我不值得拥有一份礼物

translation.en: No, I'm sure we just can't--
translation.zh: ‎不 我肯定我们只是不能...

translation.en: -Maybe Santa-- -They really work! I can't hear shit!
translation.zh:
‎-也许圣诞老人...
‎-它们真好用！我啥也听不到！

translation.en: Terry!
translation.zh: ‎特里！

translation.en: Terry, those aren't for you.
translation.zh: ‎特里 那些不是给你的

translation.en: -Those aren't for you! -I really can't hear shit.
translation.zh:
‎-那些不是给你的！
‎-我真的啥也听不到

translation.en: Terry!
translation.zh: ‎特里！

translation.en: It was for Orphan Terry.
translation.zh: ‎那是给孤儿特里的

translation.en: [Terry] The holiday spirit.
translation.zh: ‎节日精神

translation.en: You can't wrap it up and put it under the tree,
translation.zh: ‎你不能把它包起来放在树下

translation.en: but it's still the most valuable gift I've ever received.
translation.zh:
‎但它仍然是
‎我收到过的最珍贵礼物

translation.en: After the headphones, of course.
translation.zh: ‎当然 它排在耳机之后
